item.title: WP Booking Calendar 3.0.0 - WordPress Plugin
item.description: Name :WP Booking Calendar - WordPress Plugin Version : 3.0.0 OS : Linux Type : Calendars Price : 18 Homepage : SalePage WordPress Booking Calendar helps you to easily add to your own wordpress website a powerful and simple booking system to in a few minutes.
item.yandex:full-text: Features time slots availability immediately visible instantaneous preview the available time slots on rollover made easier.comsurfing in choosing months and days multiple reservations possibility easy to use interface unlimited number of calendars to set (each calendar can refer to a different service available for reservation) unlimited number of time slots setting the duration of each one customizable number of available reservations per slot each calendar has its own independent set of settings once created a calendar, possibility to modify every time slot, one by one or in group, at any time possibility to add different slots per day at your convenience possibility to set you closing days Possibility to choose how many days before the user has to book the slots option to set the mandatory fields of the booking form booking form captcha, enable or disable chance to choice how to confirm reservations (automatically, verified by email or manually in the admin panel) Wp.Booking.Calendar.PHP.NULLED-tgMember.rar Wp.Booking.Calendar.PHP.NULLED-tgMember.rar Wp.Booking.Calendar.PHP.NULLED-tgMember.rar Wp.Booking.Calendar.PHP.NULLED-tgMember.rar Wp.Booking.Calendar.PHP.NULLED-tgMember.rar

Features
  • time slots availability immediately visible
  • instantaneous preview the available time slots on rollover
  • made easier.comsurfing in choosing months and days
  • multiple reservations possibility
  • easy to use interface
  • unlimited number of calendars to set (each calendar can refer to a different service available for reservation)
  • unlimited number of time slots setting the duration of each one
  • customizable number of available reservations per slot
  • each calendar has its own independent set of settings
  • once created a calendar, possibility to modify every time slot, one by one or in group, at any time
  • possibility to add different slots per day at your convenience
  • possibility to set you closing days
  • Possibility to choose how many days before the user has to book the slots
  • option to set the mandatory fields of the booking form
  • booking form captcha, enable or disable
  • chance to choice how to confirm reservations (automatically, verified by email or manually in the admin panel)

item.title: Vehicle and Taxi Booking for WordPress 1.0
item.description: Name :Vehicle and Taxi Booking for WordPress Version : 1.0 OS : Linux Type : WordPress Price : Homepage : SalePage Vehicle and Taxi Booking plugin for WordPress is very simple and powerful plugin. With Taxi Booking WordPress Plugin you can easily add booking forms to your wordpress site and take online bookings which willbe stored in wordpress backend and also willbe sent to e-mail.Â Your users get address suggestion as soon as they start typing the address.Â You can add unlimited vehicle types and set prices per mile per vehicle. Vehicle Booking WordPress plugin automatically calculates the prices per mile per vehicle by calculating the distance users enter for pickup and dropoff locations.

item.title: Team Booking 2.3.2 - WordPress booking system
item.description: Name :Team Booking- WordPress booking system Version : 2.3.2 OS : Linux Type : Calendars Price : 24 Homepage : SalePage Free Team Booking Plugin is a WordPress booking and reservation plugin for appointments and services with a very distinctive feature: all the availability plans are made via Google Calendar!
item.yandex:full-text: Features A complete booking solution - services, events, appointments, rooms and so on. Planning via Google Calendar - use your Google Calendar to plan availability and manage reservations Collaborative - specify WP roles allowed to be coworkers. Customizable - tweak general and personal reservation behaviour, frontend calendar style, maps, confirmation email and more. Hassle-free - the frontend booking calendar works out of the box with shortcodes! Timezone conversion - let the customers choose their timezones! Reservation form builder - create your perfect reservation forms! Payments - with PayPal and Stripe! Promotions - discount coupons and campaigns! Complete notification e-mail system - build custom e-mail content with dynamic user data Export data - a full reservations database, downloadable as *.CSV and *.XLSX files Language support - via .po and .mo files Team.Booking.PHP.NULLED-tgMember.rar Team.Booking.PHP.NULLED-tgMember.rar Team.Booking.PHP.NULLED-tgMember.rar Team.Booking.PHP.NULLED-tgMember.rar Team.Booking.PHP.NULLED-tgMember.rar
item.turbo:content:
Features
  • A complete booking solution - services, events, appointments, rooms and so on.
  • Planning via Google Calendar - use your Google Calendar to plan availability and manage reservations
  • Collaborative - specify WP roles allowed to be coworkers.
  • Customizable - tweak general and personal reservation behaviour, frontend calendar style, maps, confirmation email and more.
  • Hassle-free - the frontend booking calendar works out of the box with shortcodes!
  • Timezone conversion - let the customers choose their timezones!
  • Reservation form builder - create your perfect reservation forms!

  • Complete notification e-mail system - build custom e-mail content with dynamic user data
  • Export data - a full reservations database, downloadable as *.CSV and *.XLSX files
  • Language support - via .po and .mo files

Online reservation manager at the back-end with invoices.

item.title: HBook 1.6.3 - Hotel booking system - WordPress Plugin
item.description: Name : HBook - Hotel booking system - WordPress Plugin Version : 1.6.3 OS : Linux Type : Calendars Price : 39 Homepage : SalePage Free HBook WordPress Plugin will allow you to easily enable online reservation on your WordPress website. It is perfectly suited for anybody owning a business in the hospitality industry: hotel, B&B, holiday apartment, campsite. Thanks to Nulled HBook WordPress Plugin you will be able to add availability calendars, table rates and booking forms on your website in seconds!
item.yandex:full-text: Features FRIENDLY CLIENT INTERFACE Fit in your webpage design as HBook plugin will use the style of your theme Integrate HBook shortcodes to your own theme pages and maintain the harmony in your website Smooth booking process from accommodation search to booking confirmation Offer extra-services to your customers that can be added to their reservation Let them choose the way they pay: you can enable different payment option (deposit or full-amount) and different payment methods - online (with credit card or PayPal) or offline. EFFICIENT BOOKING MANAGEMENT Calendar view to glimpse at your bookings Reservation list in a table to view details of all bookings, add comments, change accommodation, or update remaining balance Manage your bookings thanks to the confirm, cancel and delete actions Synchronize your bookings with websites such as AirBnB, Google Cal, Homeaway, VRBO... thanks to the iCal synchronization feature Export your bookings to CSV files (for Microsoft Excel, OpenOffice Calc...) Automatic emails: admin notification of new reservation, booking aknowledgement and booking confirmation HANDY SET-UP FOR ADMINS Shortcodes to display anywhere booking forms, availability calendars or rates tables Multilingual ready: HBook works perfectly with multilingual plugins such as WPML, Polylang, or qTranslateX Customizable booking form with a drag-and-drop form builder to choose what customer details you want to gather Customizable text: any text displayed by the plugin can easily be changed FLEXIBLE TO SUIT YOUR BUSINESS Rates can be set per accommodation or per person, according to season, for extra-adults and extra-children Complex pricing is possible thanks to our advanced booking rule system which allows you to set all kind of pricing (ex: mid-week, week-end, week, etc...) Offer discounts when the booking meets the criterias you have set (ex: longer stay, Mon-Thurs, etc...) Set fees to be added automatically to the reservation. It can be set in a variety of ways to suit any case Online payments can be handled with Stripe and/or PayPal Hbook.1.6.3.PHP.NULLED-tgMember.rar Hbook.1.6.3.PHP.NULLED-tgMember.rar Hbook.1.6.3.PHP.NULLED-tgMember.rar Hbook.1.6.3.PHP.NULLED-tgMember.rar Hbook.1.6.3.PHP.NULLED-tgMember.rar
item.turbo:content:
Features
FRIENDLY CLIENT INTERFACE
  • Fit in your webpage design as HBook plugin will use the style of your theme
  • Integrate HBook shortcodes to your own theme pages and maintain the harmony in your website
  • Smooth booking process from accommodation search to booking confirmation
  • Offer extra-services to your customers that can be added to their reservation
  • Let them choose the way they pay: you can enable different payment option (deposit or full-amount) and different payment methods - online (with credit card or PayPal) or offline.

EFFICIENT BOOKING MANAGEMENT
  • Calendar view to glimpse at your bookings
  • Reservation list in a table to view details of all bookings, add comments, change accommodation, or update remaining balance
  • Manage your bookings thanks to the confirm, cancel and delete actions
  • Synchronize your bookings with websites such as AirBnB, Google Cal, Homeaway, VRBO... thanks to the iCal synchronization feature
  • Export your bookings to CSV files (for Microsoft Excel, OpenOffice Calc...)
  • Automatic emails: admin notification of new reservation, booking aknowledgement and booking confirmation

HANDY SET-UP FOR ADMINS
  • Shortcodes to display anywhere booking forms, availability calendars or rates tables
  • Multilingual ready: HBook works perfectly with multilingual plugins such as WPML, Polylang, or qTranslateX
  • Customizable booking form with a drag-and-drop form builder to choose what customer details you want to gather
  • Customizable text: any text displayed by the plugin can easily be changed

FLEXIBLE TO SUIT YOUR BUSINESS
  • Rates can be set per accommodation or per person, according to season, for extra-adults and extra-children
  • Complex pricing is possible thanks to our advanced booking rule system which allows you to set all kind of pricing (ex: mid-week, week-end, week, etc...)
  • Offer discounts when the booking meets the criterias you have set (ex: longer stay, Mon-Thurs, etc...)
  • Set fees to be added automatically to the reservation. It can be set in a variety of ways to suit any case
  • Online payments can be handled with Stripe and/or PayPal

item.title: Filter Bar 4.4 - The Events Calendar Addon
item.description: Name :Filter Bar - The Events Calendar Addon Version : 4.4 OS : Linux Type : Calendar Price : 299 Homepage : SalePage Is your calendar loaded with events? That's awesome! But you also want to make sure that users can find the events that are relevant for them amid all the entries. Perhaps a user is looking for a free event on the weekend that's within walking distance. Or they want to see all the events that happen on Monday afternoons. That's where the Filter Bar comes in! Nulled Filter Bar for WordPress integrates smoothly with the search choices in the event bar as well as with all the views available through the plugins suite. And for the icing on the cake, all filters append the URL.which allows you to share the pre-filtered calendar with others or bookmark it.
item.yandex:full-text: Features Our Filter Bar add-on, which works with both The Events Calendar and Events Calendar PRO, adds a configurable set of filters to your event pages. Users can search for events by Event Category, post tag, venue, organizer, day of the week, time of day, and price. If you've got Events Calendar PRO, there is also a distance filter to go along with PRO's location search. Of course, you can pick and choose which filters are available to users on the front end. You can decide if the filter bar is horizontal under the search options (great for narrow sites and mobile) or vertical like a sidebar (best for full width calendars). The.Events.Calendar.Filter.Bar.4.4.PHP.NULLED-tgMember.rar The.Events.Calendar.Filter.Bar.4.4.PHP.NULLED-tgMember.rar The.Events.Calendar.Filter.Bar.4.4.PHP.NULLED-tgMember.rar The.Events.Calendar.Filter.Bar.4.4.PHP.NULLED-tgMember.rar The.Events.Calendar.Filter.Bar.4.4.PHP.NULLED-tgMember.rar
item.turbo:content:
Features
Our Filter Bar add-on, which works with both The Events Calendar and Events Calendar PRO, adds a configurable set of filters to your event pages. Users can search for events by Event Category, post tag, venue, organizer, day of the week, time of day, and price. If you've got Events Calendar PRO, there is also a distance filter to go along with PRO's location search. Of course, you can pick and choose which filters are available to users on the front end. You can decide if the filter bar is horizontal under the search options (great for narrow sites and mobile) or vertical like a sidebar (best for full width calendars).
